frame.name: Claim_ownership
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Claimant</fen> asserts his or her right to possession of a piece of <fen>Property</fen> (either real, such as land, or private). The Claimant may be acting on the behalf of a <fen>Beneficiary</fen>. <ex><fex name="Claimant">The King</fex> <t>claims</t> <fex name="Property">this land and surrounding waters</fex>.</ex> <ex>Hoping to strike it rich, Thaddeus Gulch staked <fex name="Claimant">his</fex> <t>claim</t> by the river bed.</ex> <ex><fex name="Claimant">I</fex> <supp>have</supp> <t>dibs</t> <fex name="Property">on the last piece of cake</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Claimant
FE.definition: <def-root>The Claimant asserts rights or priviliges, typically ownership, over some Property. <ex>The king ordered <fex name="Clm">the envoy</fex> to <t>claim</t> the land accross the river.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Property
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Property</fen> is declared to be under the ownership of the <fen>Claimant</fen>. <ex>I <t>claim</t> <fex name="Prp">this forest and environs</fex> in the name of the Queen.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Beneficiary
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Beneficiary</fen> is declared the owner of the <fen>Property</fen> by the <fen>Claimant</fen>, or the person or group in whose name or favor the <fen>Claimant</fen> is acting. <ex>I <t>claim</t> this forest and environs <fex name="Ben">in the name of the Queen</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Role</fen> of the land claimed. <ex>The French government <t>claimed</t> this string of islands <fex name="Role">as their own</fex>.</ex> <ex>As of yet, no one has <t>claimed</t> this hill <fex name="Role">as belonging to anyone</fex>.</ex></def-root>
